metadata.name: Illusion Hearts + Book of Illusions
metadata.description:
These two features were planned to be in the now-cancelled Antibirth update, so we decided to bring them back!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/tp9LIOS.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/tS0WQmH.png[/img] 𝐈𝐥𝐥𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐬 [img]https://i.imgur.com/tS0WQmH.png[/img]
- Gives Isaac a clone of himself - The clone can be killed - The hearts have a 50% chance to replace golden hearts
[img]https://i.imgur.com/tS0WQmH.png[/img] 𝐁𝐨𝐨𝐤 𝐨𝐟 𝐈𝐥𝐥𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 [img]https://i.imgur.com/tS0WQmH.png[/img]
- An active item that gives Isaac an illusion heart - 6 room charge - Item pools: Angel Room, Devil Room, Library, Greed Shop - Features full EID & Encyclopedia support
